channel.title: Why don't we have a bump?
channel.description:
[center]Why don't we have a bump for the forums, where a thread owner could bump the topic to the top every 12/24 hours or so?
Imo it would help a good part of the community we have here[/center]

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

I’m a bit late on this but whatever.

What about 3 consecutive bumps with a longer wait after each consecutive bump?

First bump is 24 hours, second consecutive bump is 3 days, then a week. Resets after reply.

IIRC the RuneScape forums does this with a set 24 hours in between bumps.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I’m against the idea, if you really wanna bump you can remove your old post,
and if your thread doesn’t get bumped by others it’s because it’s not worth being bumped.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Acorn_:

because this website has cancer and is dying

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Some threads just need to be buried.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:22, topic:526507”]I am against this idea, ESPECIALLY for server advertisements. It’ll just turn into a bumping war, with people trying to out-bump each other. That’s ignoring the fact that it’s just spam even with a time limit.

If you were the last poster in the thread then technically you could delete your last post than repost it with an edit or something. I do not suggest doing this (as you may get infracted) unless you have a relevant reason for the bump such as updates and news.

Because other people can reply to your threads - if they don’t reply to it then there’s normally a reason why.

This. If a topic goes dead, than people are not interested. Sometimes we bump old topics and depending on the situation it is tolerable. But I never want to see this a regular occurance of the server advertisement board.[/quote]
We could have it for Server Help instead. Since multi-topics aren’t allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I think instead of limiting it only being able to post once at a time but changing it to being able to do 2-3 because for server development you may need to reserve the top 2 comments for extras that the main topic may not have space for.
There would still be more of a use to being able to post once a time.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I am against this idea, ESPECIALLY for server advertisements. It’ll just turn into a bumping war, with people trying to out-bump each other. That’s ignoring the fact that it’s just spam even with a time limit.

If you were the last poster in the thread then technically you could delete your last post than repost it with an edit or something. I do not suggest doing this (as you may get infracted) unless you have a relevant reason for the bump such as updates and news.

Ambokile:

Because other people can reply to your threads - if they don’t reply to it then there’s normally a reason why.

This. If a topic goes dead, than people are not interested. Sometimes we bump old topics and depending on the situation it is tolerable. But I never want to see this a regular occurance of the server advertisement board.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Bump. We really need this.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:18, topic:526507”][quote author=Travas link=topic=645250.msg4340845#msg4340845 date=1375145880]

Just make another account and bump it or get a friend to.

Please don’t give him suggestions… I could do without seeing his posts
[/quote]That’s why there is an ignore list. There is no need to spill your hate of a person into the community.

I don’t hate him at all. I simply think that a lot of his posts are of a very low quality and don’t really provide much benefit to anyone.
Here, for example, he asks for a web browser and then rules out the main ones.
He was constantly flaming other users in this thread because their opinions disagreed with his (and he didn’t have much knowledge of the subject he was discussing). He told people to suck a dick, go to hell, go to jail, called them bitches, fudge off, etc. He spills a lot of hate into the community and I’d rather him not have the ability to constantly bump it to the top.[/quote]Then report him and move on.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:

[quote=“Travas, post:17, topic:526507”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=645250.msg4340838#msg4340838 date=1375145522]

Just make another account and bump it or get a friend to.

Please don’t give him suggestions… I could do without seeing his posts
[/quote]That’s why there is an ignore list. There is no need to spill your hate of a person into the community.[/quote]

I don’t hate him at all. I simply think that a lot of his posts are of a very low quality and don’t really provide much benefit to anyone.
Here, for example, he asks for a web browser and then rules out the main ones.
He was constantly flaming other users in this thread because their opinions disagreed with his (and he didn’t have much knowledge of the subject he was discussing). He told people to suck a dick, go to hell, go to jail, called them bitches, fuck off, etc. He spills a lot of hate into the community and I’d rather him not have the ability to constantly bump it to the top.

Read full topic

item.title: Why don't we have a bump?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

A owner being able to bump their own thread once or twice a day would just lead to a server competition of who can be on top the longest. We will be stuck with the bad servers nobody comments on because they don’t like them rather then the ones that are good. It makes more sense for the owner to be able to bump after a thread post rather then whenever he felt like it.

Read full topic
item.source: Why don't we have a bump?
